snippet.title: Wordament Snap Attack Launch Trailer
snippet.description: Snap Attack is an entirely new kind of word building game built on the heritage of the Wordament, with an new game mechanic we think you'll love.  Snap Attack is game about building combinations of words.  In each 2 ½ minute round, you compete with thousands of other players at once, trying to get the best score.  All players use the exact same board and rack of tiles.  Points are earned by building combinations of words, or as we call them, Snaps.  Your score is then ranked against everyone that just played that round with you and you immediately see how well you did.
